entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 40%
